document.full_text: actor dennis quaid says his biggest mistake was getting addicted to cocaine, but that the drug was so prevalent in hollywood in the 1980s that supplies were built into the budgets of movies.
document.title: cocaine once part of film budgets, dennis quaid says
lines_and_colors: actor dennis quaid says his biggest mistake was getting addicted to cocaine, but that the drug was so prevalent in hollywood in the 1980s that supplies were built into the budgets of movies.
